title: Cam Newton Injury; Biggest Training Camp Surprises & Preseason Thursday
itunes:title: Cam Newton Injury; Biggest Training Camp Surprises & Preseason Thursday
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all of the latest news around the NFL including the latest with Cam Newton's foot (7:02), Patrick Chung's indictment (10:45), and the Cardinals signing Crabtree (14:19). The heroes spin through the preseason Thursday takeaways and the biggest training camp surprises. (43:07)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
